mapper.select: select record.* from sys_menu as record where record.parent_id = #{parentId} and record.is_delete=0 order by record.sort_order

SELECT DISTINCT smnu.id ,smnu.name ,smnu.type ,smnu.path ,smnu.sort_order ,smnu.level ,smnu.parent_id ,smnu.permission_id ,smnu.icon_dcode ,smnu.parent_id ,smnu.is_effect ,iconDic.style as icon ,sysFile.file_url as iconFurl FROM sys_menu as smnu LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission as srfc on srfc.permission_id = smnu.permission_id AND srfc.scope != 0 LEFT JOIN sys_user as sysAccount on FIND_IN_SET(srfc.role_id,sysAccount.role_id) LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary as iconDic on iconDic.code = smnu.icon_dcode LEFT JOIN sys_file as sysFile on sysFile.id = smnu.icon_fid where (sysAccount.id = #{record.id} AND smnu.is_effect=1 and smnu.is_delete=0 OR smnu.id in ( SELECT DISTINCT smnu1.parent_id FROM sys_menu as smnu1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission as srfc1 on srfc1.permission_id = smnu1.permission_id AND srfc1.scope != 0 LEFT JOIN sys_user as sysUser1 on FIND_IN_SET(srfc1.role_id,sysUser1.role_id) where (sysUser1.id = #{record.id} OR smnu1.id in ( SELECT DISTINCT smnu2.parent_id FROM sys_menu as smnu2 LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission as srfc2 on srfc2.permission_id = smnu2.permission_id AND srfc2.scope != 0 LEFT JOIN sys_user as sysUser2 on FIND_IN_SET(srfc2.role_id,sysUser2.role_id) where sysUser2.id = #{record.id} AND smnu2.is_effect = 1 and smnu2.is_delete=0 ))AND smnu1.is_effect = 1 and smnu1.is_delete=0 ))AND smnu.is_effect = 1 and smnu.is_delete=0 ORDER BY smnu.parent_id,smnu.sort_order
